goal.en: “This course introduces various techniques on observing, measuring and recording data for exposed rock outcrops. Principles and techniques on interpreting well logs will be addressed. The three major rock types and secondary geological structures will be reviewed. How to read or prepare a regional geological map will also be taught in this course.“
goal.ch: 講授野外露頭觀測、量測及記錄方法，介紹野外三大岩類分類及主要地質構造等，繪製區域地質圖，井下電測資料解釋。

content.en: “1. Introduction, planning on geological surveys, and field tools2. Measurements on geological structures and instruments manipulation3 Surface geological investigations4 Subsurface geological investigation5 Topographic maps6 Geological maps7 Reporting on field geological survey“
content.ch: “課程大綱：1. 序論、地質調查規劃與野外工具2. 地質構造測量及儀器使用3. 地表地質調查4. 地下地質調查5. 地形圖6. 地質圖7. 野外調查報告撰寫“
